title: Real time income information response schema v1.0

taxYear.description: The tax year to which the earnings information in this record applies

employerPayeRef.description: Unique identifier for the Scheme making the payment

employerName1.description: Name of the Scheme employing the individual (part 1)

employerName2.description: Name of the Scheme employing the individual (part 2)

employerTradeName1.description: Trade Name of the Scheme employing the individual (part 1)

employerTradeName2.description: Trade Name of the Scheme employing the individual (part 2)

nationalInsuranceNumber.description: The NINO of the Individual for which the Payment Data is being issued

surname.description: Surname of the person for whom the Payment Data has been received

forename.description: Forename of the person for whom the Payment Data has been received

secondForename.description: Second Forename of the person for whom the Payment Data has been received

initials.description: Initials of the person for whom the Payment Data has been received

payrollId.description: Identifier assigned by the employer to the individual

employmentStartDate.description: Start Date of the Employment for which the Payment Data

employmentEndDate.description: End Date of the Employment for which the Payment Data

taxablePayInPeriod.description: Taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits in kind

paymentsNotSubjectToTaxOrNICS.description: Value of payments not subject to tax or NICs in pay period

valueOfDeductions.description: Value of deductions from net pay in pay period

benefitsTaxedViaPayroll.description: Value of benefits taxed via the payroll in pay period

employeePensionContributions.description: Value of employee pension contributions paid under net pay arrangements in pay period

itemsSubjectToClass1NIC.description: Items subject to Class 1 NIC but not taxed under PAYE regulations excluding pension contributions in pay period

employeePensionContributionsNotPaid.description: Value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement

taxDeductedOrRefunded.description: Value of tax deducted or refunded from this payment

grossEarningsForNICs.description: Gross earnings for NICs in this pay period

employeesContributionsInPeriod.description: Employees contributions due on all earnings in this pay period

taxablePayToDate.description: Taxable pay to date in this employment including payrolled benefits in kind

totalTaxToDate.description: Total tax to date in this employment

employeesContributionsYearToDate.description: Employees contributions due on all earnings year to date

numberOfNormalHoursWorked.description: Code for number of normal hours worked

weeklyPeriodNumber.description: Tax Week Number between 1 and 56 excluding 55

earningsPeriodsCovered.description: Number of earnings period(s) covered by payment

paymentAfterLeaving.description: Indicator that the payment is a payment after date of notification of contract ending

uniquePaymentId.description: Unique Id sent with a payment

paymentConfidenceStatus.description: Indicates the Payment Confidence Status at the time of sending the Payment to DWP

unpaidAbsencePayPeriod.description: Identification that an Individual has been on unpaid absence within the RTI Payment Period

benefitsTaxedYeartoDate.description: Value of benefits taxed via the payroll year to date

pensionContributionsYearToDate.description: Value of employee pension Contributions paid under Net pay arrangements YTD

pensionContributionsNotPaidYeartoDate.description: Value of Employee Pension Contributions That Are Not Paid Under Net Pay Arrangements YTD

taxCode.description: Tax Code Operated on the Payment

multipleIPSIndicator.description: Multiple IPS records used to determine payment confidence status of Payment Confirmed Amount Differs

bacsPaymentAmount.description: The BACS payment amount (in pence) used in determining the payment confidence status

statutoryMaternityPayYeartoDate.description: Statutory Maternity Pay Year to Date

latePayeReportingReason.description: Code for Late PAYE Reporting Reason

taxCodeBasisisNonCumulative.description: Tax Code Basis is Non Cumulative

statutoryPaternityPayYearToDate.description: Statutory Paternity Pay Year to Date

valueofStatutoryAdoptionPayYearToDate.description: Value of Statutory Adoption Pay Year to Date

sharedParentalPayYearToDate.description: Shared Parental Pay Year to Date

partnerSurnameOrFamilyName.description: Partner's surname or family name for Additional Statutory Paternity Pay / Shared Parental Pay claim

partnerForenameOrGivenName.description: Partner's forename for Additional Statutory Paternity Pay / Shared Parental Pay claim

partnerInitials.description: Partner's initials for Additional Statutory Paternity Pay / Shared Parental Pay claim

partnerSecondForename.description: Partner's second forename for Additional Statutory Paternity Pay / Shared Parental Pay claim

partnerNINO.description: The NINO of the employee's social partner

grossEarningsForNICsYearToDate.description: Gross Earnings for NICs Year to Date

taxWeekNumberOfAppointmentOfDirector.description: Tax Week Number of Appointment of Director

totalEmployerNIContributionsInPeriod.description: Total Employer NI Contributions in Period

seriousillHealthLumpSum.description: Indicate yes if any part of the payment is a serious ill health lump sum

hmrcReceiptTimestamp.description: The date and time that the submission was received from the employer at the government gateway

rtiReceivedDate.description: The date that the submission was received by the RTI core service

apiAvailableTimestamp.description: The date and time this information was available to the API

paymentNoLongerValid.description: The date on which the payment was no longer linked to the employment

monetaryPosNeg7Digits.description: Values between -99999.00 and 99999.00 in whole numbers only
